question: Where did Daniel sleep?
answer1: under the walls of the Pooka's tower

question: Where did Daniel live?
answer1: at the bottom of Hungry Hill, just at the right-hand side of the road as you go towards Bantry

question: Who did the young master dance with?
answer1: Peggy Barry

question: Why did Daniel step to Molly Cronohan's?
answer1: to speak a word about the bracket heifer that was bewitched

question: Where did Daniel walk to?
answer1: a big bog

question: What did the Daniel sing?
answer1: the ULLAGONE

question: Who looked at Daniel full in the face?
answer1: an eagle

question: What happened after Daniel sang the Ullagone?
answer1: The moon grew black.

question: What did Daniel wonder?
answer1: how an eagle came to speak like a Christian

question: What did Daniel wish?
answer1: He was safe home again.

question: What did the eagle tell Daniel to do to get off the island?
answer1: get up on the eagle's back and grip him well

question: Why did the eagle decide to help Daniel?
answer1: Daniel was a decent sober man who tended mass well, and never flung stones at the eagle nor cries out after one in the field

question: How did the eagle swear to not make game out of Daniel?
answer1: put his right foot on his breast

question: Why did the eagle tell Daniel to be quiet?
answer1: Daniel asked the eagle every minute to fly down.

question: What did the eagle see that made him keep flying?
answer1: two men and a gun

question: What did the eagle tell Daniel to do until he rests himself?
answer1: sit down on the moon
answer2: catch fast hold of the reaping-hook that stuck out of the side of the moon

question: What will happen if the eagle gives Daniel a shake and slap of his wing?
answer1: The eagle will send Daniel down to the ground.

question: What did the eagle say Daniel robbed?
answer1: the eagle's nest last year

question: What did the eagle do when Daniel cursed at him?
answer1: spreaded out his great big wings, burst out a laughing, and flew away like lightning

question: What happened after the eagle left?
answer1: a door opened right in the middle of the moon, creaking on its hinges as if it had not been opened for a month before

question: How did Daniel recognize the man in the moon?
answer1: by his bush

question: What did the man on the moon tell Daniel not to do?
answer1: stay here
answer2: hold on hard by the reaping-hook

question: Why did Daniel think the moon and all would fall?
answer1: The man on the moon gave the door such a great bang after him.

question: What did the man do with the kitchen cleaver?
answer1: gave two bangs to the handle of the reaping-hook that was holding Daniel up

question: What happened to Daniel after the man broke the reaping-hook?
answer1: fell down with a bit of the handle in my hand
answer3: rolled and rolled, at the rate of a fox-hunt

question: Why was Daniel preparing himself after the man slammed the door?
answer1: to try strength with the man

question: Why did Daniel agree to the gander's help?
answer1: There was no help.

question: How did the gander plan to help Daniel?
answer1: put out Daniel's hand and catch the gander by the leg

question: Where were the geese flying to?
answer1: Arabia

question: What did Daniel want the goose to do to him?
answer1: drop him on the ship

question: What happened to Daniel after he made a request to the goose?
answer1: He came down plump into the very bottom of the salt sea.

question: Who woke up Daniel?
answer1: Judy

question: How did Judy wake Daniel up?
answer1: with a tub full of water, she splashed all over him

question: What did Daniel say he was fairly bothered with?
answer1: eagles, and men of the moons, and flying ganders, and whales

question: Why was Daniel blessing himself?
answer1: He did not drown.

question: How will Daniel feel approaching the shore?
answer1: lucky

question: Why did Daniel accept the eagle's offer?
answer1: The eagle placed his right  foot on his breast.
answer3: Daniel did not want to stay at the bog.

question: Why did the eagle refuse to drop Daniel off at his cabin?
answer1: The eagle wanted to play a trick.
answer2: The eagle saw two men with a gun.
answer3: The eagle did not want to drop Daniel home.

question: How will Daniel feel when the eagle complains about flying for so long?
answer1: annoyed

question: Why was Daniel angry at the eagle?
answer1: The eagle did not drop him off at his cabin.
answer2: The eagle blamed Daniel for his misfortunes.

question: Why did Daniel continue to hold the reaping-hook?
answer1: The man on the moon did not want to help Daniel.
answer2: Daniel wanted to spite the man on the moon.
answer3: The eagle told him to hold it.

question: Why did the man go back to the moon?
answer1: to get a cleaver

question: What will happen if Daniel accepts someone else's help?
answer1: Daniel will be told to be quiet.
answer2: Daniel will not be dropped home.
